sentences.en: A strong link was found between parental mental illness and disturbance in their children.
sentences.cn: 业已发现父母的精神病史和子女的精神障碍之间有密切的关系。

sentences.en: Autopolyploids are genetically isolated from their parental diploids.
sentences.cn: 同源多倍体与其亲本二倍体在遗传上相隔离.

sentences.en: Children always revolt against parental disciplines.
sentences.cn: 孩子们总是反抗父母的管束.

sentences.en: He blamed lack of parental control for the young tearaways' behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他认为，那些小流氓行为不端是因为缺少家教。

sentences.en: He encourages parental involvement in the running of school.
sentences.cn: 他鼓励学生家长参与学校的管理.

sentences.en: He had come , in a mood of solemn parental patronage, to look on.
sentences.cn: 他带着严肃的父辈保护人的神气过来看看.

sentences.en: Opening a new school will increase parental choice.
sentences.cn: 开办一所新学校将会扩大父母的选择范围。

sentences.en: Parental consent is required before the operation can take place.
sentences.cn: 手术前须征得父母同意。

sentences.en: Parental love is deep and true.
Parental love is so touching and at bottom so childish.
sentences.cn: 双亲的爱如此动人,从根本上讲如此富有孩子气.

sentences.en: Parents are entitled to 13 weeks' parental leave.
sentences.cn: 父母可以休13个星期的亲子假。

sentences.en: Teenagers often revolt against parental discipline.
sentences.cn: 青少年常常不遵从父母的条条框框。

sentences.en: The debate over the parental instincts of the T. Rex is now academic.
sentences.cn: 关于霸王龙父性的论点现在有学术依据了.

sentences.en: Too rigid parental control fosters rebellion in children.
sentences.cn: 父母管教过严会促使子女反抗.

sentences.en: Under the guise of active wits they will lead us to the parental meditation of antics.
sentences.cn: 而且他们还会披上活跃的智慧的外衣,引导我们以慈父的目光看待他们的恶作剧.

words.tran_cn: 父亲（或母亲）；父母亲；根源
出身；亲子关系；门第；起源

phrases.tran_cn: 部分不适合儿童观看的；父母的指导

trans.tran_cn: 父母的，亲代的，[生]（杂种）亲本的，作为来源[渊源]的
trans.tran_en: relating to being a parent and especially to being responsible for a child’s safety and development
